Package pathfinder

Class MainSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.EventSimulator
      • pathfinder.MainSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulator

    public class MainSimulator
extends EventSimulator
    This class represents the extension of applied to the specific case of best path finding simulation.

    Thus, creates a ReadFile to read the XML data and stores all the constants, also creating the Grid used.

    To simulate it from a main function, run() should be used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainSimulator

        public MainSimulator​(java.lang.String s)
        Default constructor of MainSimulator. By default, uses generators specified in project description, ExpRandom and UnifRandom respectively. Uses the given String to get XML file name and give it to ReadFile. Then, creates Grid and stores all constants from XML.
        Parameters:
        s - XML file name.

      • MainSimulator

        public MainSimulator​(java.lang.String s,
                     GenerateNumber[] g)
        Constructor of MainSimulator using given generators. Uses the given String to get XML file name and give it to ReadFile. Then, creates Grid and stores all constants from XML.
        Parameters:
        s - XML file name.
        g - given generators to be used in generating times (g[0]) and survival and movement (g[1]).

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run​()
        Implementation in specific case of this simulation.

        Consists in a cycle where events in the container are all simulated one at a time by ascending time order. Stops when container has only an observation to be made, that can happen either when all Individual die or when final instant comes.

        See Also:
        Simulator.run()

      • StartSimulation

        public void StartSimulation​()
        This method implements everything that should happen when beginning the best path finder simulation: create the list of alive individuals and the events associated with each Individual and adding them to the PEC.
        See Also:
        Simulator.StartSimulation()

      • HasOnlyObservation

        boolean HasOnlyObservation​()
        Checks whether only Event on PEC is the observation.
        Returns:
        true if has only observation and false otherwise.

      • Epidemics

        protected void Epidemics​()
        This methods does an Epidemic, saving five Individuals with greater comfort and possibly killing the rest. The probability of survival depends on Individual comfort.
